title: George Miller wanted to use drones to shoot Mad Max Fury Road but health and safety stopped him
text:
George Miller wanted to use drones to shoot Mad Max Fury Road but health and safety stopped him 
Published By: Pocket-lint.com - Today 
The director of Mad Max Fury Road, George Miller, is a massive fan of technology and used every device available to him to make the critical... Read Full Story ... Related articles:
